p: The α-amylase inhibitory activity of each extract fraction was carried out according to the standard method, with minor modifications [ 14]. Each plant fraction was dissolved in 3 ml of 10% DMSO and then further dissolved in buffer (0.02 M of Na 2HPO 4/NaH 2PO 4, 0.006 M NaCl, at pH 6.9) to give concentrations of 1000 μg/ml, from which the following dilutions were prepared: 10, 50, 70, 100, and 500 μg/ml. The porcine pancreatic α-amylase enzyme solution was freshly prepared at a concentration of 2 units/ml in 10% DMSO.
